description.en:
Neural protocol is a global decentralize payment gateway ecosystem that is based  on ethereum platform. 

While existing solutions offer to solve just one problem at a time, our team is up to build a secure, useful, & easy-to-use product based on private blockchain. It will include easy cryptocurrency payments integration, and even a marketplace integrated with blockchain.

NRP is a new breakthrough in digital currency. We have a vision to make it easier for everyone to make payments and transact safely and try to create a new economic ecosystem
